Ballpoint

Oct 24, 2003

I can’t remember when I received my first “Space Pen” – I used to love those things. The Astronauts used them! You could write upside down, on an oily surface, in extreme heat, anywhere… So you can imagine my shock, surprise, and horror to find out that normal ball point pens write in space! For the son of a physicist, it is like learning that Santa Clause doesn’t exist.
